DOC.brief_summary: The specific objective study examine whether treatment aim emotional disclosure may beneficial psychological , health immune effect HIV infect individual . The goal current study test efficacy emotional disclosure write patient HIV infection . We compare emotional disclosure write traumatic experience ( experimental intervention ) control intervention ( write emotionally neutral topic ) . DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1865 year age inclusive At least 8 year formal education Literate Fluent English All follow three must apply : No active Category C HIV AIDSdefining symptom CD4 Tlymphocyte count 150499 Viral load > 1000 Exclusion Criteria Less 8 year formal education Illiterate nonEnglish speaking Active systemic disease would interfere participation Current alcohol substance dependence Planned change HIV medication next 6 month , recent change past 2 month Introduction antidepressant medication within 30 day study start Current psychological counseling , cognitive behavior therapy , support group psychological therapy , plan start Diagnosis PTSD major depression Unable attend least 4 treatment session
